explainability.findings: A technical paper describes International Paper's implementation of machine learning models for manufacturing. This system processes sensor data to produce real-time KPI scores and AI-generated recommendations, which are displayed on operator dashboards. This display contributes to explainability for users.
explainability.path_to_improvement: Publish user-facing explanation interfaces or documented appeal workflows.

relevant_sources.summary: This technical paper provides evidence for the **transparency** and **explainability** pillars of responsible AI. It details International Paper's implementation of machine learning models for manufacturing, describing how the system processes sensor data to produce real-time KPI scores and AI-generated recommendations displayed on operator dashboards, which contributes to transparency of operations and explainability for users. While the paper documents concrete AI system implementation, it does not explicitly detail governance practices.
relevant_sources.title: International Paper Implements Altair AI - Machine Learning Models for Manufacturing

external_accountability.path_to_improvement: Obtain external validation of AI practices or require vendor certifications.

fairness.path_to_improvement: Document bias testing procedures or vendor AI fairness requirements.

governance.findings: Sources describe documented governance practices in 1 source(s). Additional documentation references related practices.
governance.path_to_improvement: Name an AI governance body with defined mandate covering all AI use.

relevant_sources.summary: This technical paper provides evidence for the **transparency** and **explainability** pillars of responsible AI. It details International Paper's implementation of machine learning models for manufacturing, describing how the system processes sensor data to produce real-time KPI scores and AI-generated recommendations displayed on operator dashboards, which contributes to transparency of operations and explainability for users. While the paper documents concrete AI system implementation, it does not explicitly detail governance practices.
relevant_sources.title: International Paper Implements Altair AI - Machine Learning Models for Manufacturing

oversight.path_to_improvement: Document human review processes for AI-assisted decisions (built or vendor AI).

privacy.path_to_improvement: Document data protection practices for AI systems, including vendor AI data handling.

transparency.findings: A technical paper describes International Paper's implementation of machine learning models for manufacturing. This system processes sensor data to produce real-time KPI scores and AI-generated recommendations, which are displayed on operator dashboards. This display contributes to the transparency of operations.
transparency.path_to_improvement: Publish detailed documentation (model cards, system specs) for AI systems deployed.

relevant_sources.summary: This technical paper provides evidence for the **transparency** and **explainability** pillars of responsible AI. It details International Paper's implementation of machine learning models for manufacturing, describing how the system processes sensor data to produce real-time KPI scores and AI-generated recommendations displayed on operator dashboards, which contributes to transparency of operations and explainability for users. While the paper documents concrete AI system implementation, it does not explicitly detail governance practices.
relevant_sources.title: International Paper Implements Altair AI - Machine Learning Models for Manufacturing

summary.overall_findings: International Paper's published materials describe the implementation of machine learning models for manufacturing, where the system processes sensor data to produce real-time KPI scores, providing evidence for both transparency and explainability. These disclosures, alongside documented governance practices, address 3 of 7 evaluated responsible AI pillars. The assessment draws on a review of 1 publicly available source. No qualifying public evidence was found for fairness, oversight, and 2 additional pillars.
